name: Sandbox Samples
tagline: Sandbox - here you can find examples on different programming languages and frameworks
body:
## Sandbox Samples
Here you can find examples on different programming languages and frameworks.

### Scala
* [Hello, Scala](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example1.scala)
* [Simple Ariphmetic](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example2.scala)
* [Type Declaration](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example3.scala)
* [Functions - it so simple](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example4.scala)
* [Anonymous Functions](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example5.scala)
* [Partial Function Call](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example6.scala)
* [Functions as arguments](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example7.scala)
* [Function inside function](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example8.scala)
* [Type casting](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example9.scala)
* [Currying Functions](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example10.scala)
* [Variable number of arguments](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example11.scala)
* [Classes](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example12.scala)
* [Constructor of class](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example13.scala)
* [Inheritage](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example14.scala)
* [Traits](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example15.scala)
* [Multiply string is fun](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example16.scala)
* [Big Ariphmetics](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example17.scala)
* [For-statements](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example18.scala)
* [Another style of for-loop](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example19.scala)
* [Recursion](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Scala/Example20.scala)

### Go
* [Hello, Go](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example1.go)
* [Variable declaration](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example2.go)
* [Simple Ariphmethic](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example3.go)
* [Functions](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example4.go)
* [Take arguments and return answer!](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example5.go)
* [Returning more than one answer](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Go/Example6.go)

### Python
* [Hello, Python](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example1.py)
* [Variables](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example2.py)
* [Aripthmetics](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example3.py)
* [Function definition](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example4.py)
* [Return more that one answer](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example5.py)
* [If-statements](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Python/Example6.py)

### Ruby
* [Hello, Ruby](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example1.rb)
* [Variables and ariphmethic](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example2.rb)
* [Constants](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example3.rb)
* [Functions](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example4.rb)
* [Return answer from functions](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example5.rb)
* [Multi-result](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/blob/master/Ruby/Example6.rb)

## Another samples
It will be another samples, if I will start learning something new. Planned samples in Kotlin, C++, C#, Haskell, Java and another.

## Contacts and reports
If you find mistake - please, tell me on my GitHub profile about it: [asaskevich](https://github.com/asaskevich) or in issues [here](https://github.com/asaskevich/Sandbox/issues)
